job.title: NetSuite Sr Software Engineer - Java , AIML, Time Series
job.description: Oracle NetSuite is looking for an ambitious software engineer for our infrastructure teams to scale out our world leading cloud ERP system. The NetSuite application is used by tens of thousands of customers to manage their day-to-day business operations. The Infrastructure AIOps team offers services to both internal stakeholders and external customers to proactively monitor and predict system health and predict resource consumption. We are scaling our services to identify & remediate problems quickly and accurately. We are constantly exploring techniques to do more with less and challenging the status quo. We use some of the latest technologies to build the necessary tools to make software scale better and provide end to end monitoring for end users. As a part of the AIOps team, you will help build out real-time prediction and correlation services to improve the reliability & performance of the NetSuite service. You should be motivated to come up with innovative solutions that helps others extract operational & usage insights. You should enjoy writing production ready code that are testable, maintainable, and scalable. You should be motivated to help other team members adopt good coding standards and enjoy having technical discussions. You should be interested in data science and time series analysis. You should have experience working with large-scale software engineering system design. Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.  As a member of the software engineering division, you will assist in defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing, debugging or designing of software applications or operating systems. Provide technical leadership to other software developers. Specify, design and implement modest changes to existing software architecture to meet changing needs.  Duties and tasks are varied and complex needing independent judgment. Fully competent in own area of expertise. May have project lead role and or supervise lower level personnel. BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. 4 years of software engineering or related experience. Innovation starts with inclusion at Oracle. We are committed to creating a workplace where all kinds of people can be themselves and do their best work. It’s when everyone’s voice is heard and valued, that we are inspired to go beyond what’s been done before. That’s why we need people with diverse backgrounds, beliefs, and abilities to help us create the future, and are proud to be an affirmative-action equal opportunity employer.  Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.
